concept.title: Mission

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: states the EHS mission emphasising prevention leadership and integration of safety into operations and talent development

ol.li: Empower our people and engage our communities to achieve zero incidents. Through leading practices, we implement global, sustainable and innovative collaborative solutions. We enable learning, recognize achievements, and continuously improve.

We are committed to achieve a zero incident workplace through our people â€“ by providing them with the resources, tools and leadership support to see and solve problems that could lead to an EHS incident.

We focus on applying leading practices by collaborating with local, regional and national communities across regions, and using internal and external ideas to create sustainable, collaborative, innovative solutions.
We are committed to being a learning organization; to recognize and reward EHS employees and our partners in the functions and businesses; and to improve our processes and results every day.
